card_text: 3 Level 4 monsters$NOnce per turn: You can detach 1 Xyz Material from this card, then activate 1 of these effects. Each effect can only be used once while this card is face-up on the field.$N●Target 1 card your opponent controls; return that target to the hand.$N●Send 1 random card from your opponent's hand to the Graveyard.$N●Target 1 card in your opponent's Graveyard; banish that target.
